description: A compact style guide for AI to generate consistent, user-friendly UX copy.
objectives: Standardise language and structure across all interfaces.
Humanise communication with warmth and empathy.
Ensure clarity, brevity, and measurable readability.

guidance: Match tone with context and emotional intent.

types.playful_humorous: Witty, light, and entertaining when suitable.

casing.sentenceCase: Default for all content including headings.
casing.allCaps: Use only for button labels or CTAs.

grammarAndStyle.voice: Use active voice for clarity. Passive voice only for short system status.
numbers: Currency always uppercase RM with no space (RM50).
grammarAndStyle.dates: Write as Day Month Year (e.g. 18 August 2025).

verbs.tense: Use simple present or past. Avoid perfect tense.
verbs.mood: Use imperative for commands, indicative for info.

lists: Start each list item with a capital letter.
Avoid full stops unless itâ€™s a full sentence.
Use bullet points for unordered lists; numbers when sequence matters.

callsToAction.format: Keep CTA short, clear, and in ALL CAPS.

emojiUsage.principle: Use sparingly; only when they enhance tone or clarity.

methods.semantic: Preserve tone and intent over exact wording.
methods.phrasal: Use descriptive or idiomatic equivalents for natural flow.

structure: End with reassurance or clear next step.
